channel.title: Snow Computing on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Snow Computing on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Snow computing
item.description: So much talk about cloud computing, so being complementary I'll link to some bits on snow computing. On CRM usage on "snow days" from John Paterson: There has been a lot of press articles related to computing-in-the-bad-weather, talking about rolling out VPNs to peoples’ homes, how to protect the in-house network from home-borne viruses, but web based CRM needs nothing so complex - just log in and go! Sometimes life doesn’t need to be so complex.
